trans-unit.source: The PageResultRequestControl class instructs the server to return the search result in the specified page size.
trans-unit.target: PageResultRequestControl 類別指示要傳回搜尋結果中指定的頁面大小的伺服器。

trans-unit.source: The PageResultRequestControl constructor creates a new instance of the <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.PageResultRequestControl"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: PageResultRequestControl 建構函式建立的新執行個體<xref href="System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.PageResultRequestControl"></xref>類別。

trans-unit.source: The PageResultRequestControl constructor creates a new instance of the <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.PageResultRequestControl"></xref> class using the specified page search cookie.
trans-unit.target: PageResultRequestControl 建構函式建立的新執行個體<xref href="System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.PageResultRequestControl"></xref>類別使用指定的頁面搜尋 cookie。

trans-unit.source: Specifies a cookie used for subsequent paged results search calls.
trans-unit.target: 指定用於後續的分頁的結果搜尋呼叫 cookie。

trans-unit.source: The PageResultRequestControl constructor creates an instance of the <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.PageResultRequestControl"></xref> class using the requested page size.
trans-unit.target: PageResultRequestControl 建構函式建立的執行個體<xref href="System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.PageResultRequestControl"></xref>類別使用要求的頁面大小。

trans-unit.source: The Cookie property specifies the page search cookie used for subsequent paged results search calls.
trans-unit.target: [Cookie] 屬性會指定用於後續的分頁的結果搜尋呼叫頁面搜尋 cookie。

trans-unit.source: The page search cookie used for subsequent paged results search calls.
trans-unit.target: 用於後續的分頁的結果搜尋呼叫頁面搜尋 cookie。

trans-unit.source: The GetValue method returns the page size and cookie associated with this control.
trans-unit.target: GetValue 方法傳回的頁面大小和這個控制項相關聯的 cookie。

trans-unit.source: The page size and cookie associated with this control.
trans-unit.target: 頁面大小和這個控制項相關聯的 cookie。

trans-unit.source: The PageSize property specifies the requested page size.
trans-unit.target: PageSize 屬性會指定要求的頁面大小。
